::Autofire::

Autofire nods at Adrax's words as he walks after him. He sorts through his 
weapons: a rifle, two chain-guns, and a strange cannon on his shoulder.

"Yes, I would say so too," Autofire says, transfoming into his beast mode. 
His shape resembled that of a sabretooth tiger, complete with the long teeth, 
but he was covered with scales instead of fur, and two extra fangs rose 
upward, giving him an almost-as-demonic look as his comrad. He walks along 
after Adrax, wondering what turns the was has taken.
